channel.title: Increased Amount of Hackers
channel.description:
Anyone else noticing an increased amount of hackers? I just got hacked, but I didn't lose to much. Was at GE, world 2, kid said he was hacking accounts. Safety first, changed password and registered email. Gave my IRL friend 55.3m, and a few other things, since I was going to be off for a few days. Turns out, good call. Got hacked last night, lost about 4m, which isn't that bad in the grand scheme of things, could of been much worse. If anyone wants to add me, as my friends list was cleared out, PM me.
Note: Don't blame RSBot, I no longer bot. Haven't since 221 release.
Anyways, back to the discussion, anyone noticed an increase?

item.title: Increased Amount of Hackers
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“ytuio9, post:43, topic:382147”][quote author=SilentCJ link=topic=477949.msg3506812#msg3506812 date=1298210485]

Exactly right, With the right software installed on your computer nowadays you don’t even have to think before you click on a link or download as most Anti Virus pre scans it or blocks it.

This is why people get hacked.

Mostly it’s just a lack of common sense.
[/quote][/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Increased Amount of Hackers
item.dc:creator: @Knightraider Knightraider
item.description:
@Knightraider wrote:

marcbob:

I hack kids like its my job. It’s not my fault people fall for it.

Exactly right, With the right software installed on your computer nowadays you don’t even have to think before you click on a link or download as most Anti Virus pre scans it or blocks it. Most people that get hacked deserve it I bot and have been playing games for easy over 12+ years and have never been hacked once.

Read full topic

item.title: Increased Amount of Hackers
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:31, topic:382147”][quote author=ytuio9 link=topic=477949.msg3498636#msg3498636 date=1297551128]
I don’t know but something weird has been going with my accounts. Basically, I keep getting the “someone is already logged in” message, even though my account’s position is not changed, nothing is dropped. nothing is stolen or whatever (might have to do with how it’s a new account and all). But once my password was actually changed, and when I logged in, it said the last IP logging in was mine
Everytime it would say the last IP logged in was my own.
inb4ursisterhackedu
my sister is 7 and cannot play minecraft.
[/quote]

I’m getting this occasionally, about 2 times out of 5 logins…[/quote]
this.

How am i supposed to pwn scammers if i cant gtfo of the wild quick?

Read full topic

item.title: Increased Amount of Hackers
item.dc:creator: @iCreatedHorror Ryan
item.description:
@iCreatedHorror wrote:

[quote=“pure2ownage, post:27, topic:382147”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=477949.msg3497782#msg3497782 date=1297475182]

Trust me, my passwords aren’t something you can guess.
Capitol letters, numbers, lower case, random order. Ya, I have to type them 15-20 times before I memorize them.

Passwords aren’t case-sensitive, are they?
[/quote]I believe Rune Scape’s is case sensitive.[/quote]
No, the passwords aren’t case sensitive, I checked.

Read full topic

item.title: Increased Amount of Hackers
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

People say they get hacked, but they say it as it just happened instantaneously, something must have happened in between, long time ago, my cousin hacked someone, got full guthans, a fury, and a santa (worth around 16m at the time lol)
But thats not my point, heres what he did:

He became friends with the person, got to know him, if you get close to someone online, you can most likely figure out their password.

This is why i put a random 20 letter/number password, which is almost unguessable, and i usually never talk to my friends on rs…

Read full topic

item.title: Increased Amount of Hackers
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“whip of soulz, post:19, topic:382147”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=477949.msg3497573#msg3497573 date=1297463993]
I know I had some sort of server running on my computer that I didn’t autorize. The name was like Cerebus or something. I discovered it when I was checking my Windows registry, it was a login process. Disabled and deleted it, but I’m guessing it’s more than just me it’s happened to. No idea what it’s from…

Still haven’t been hacked though.
[/quote]Cerebus is a RAT.[/quote]Yes, I figured that, which is why I didn’t let it stay

Read full topic
